about_the_game:
Bride Corruption is a point-and-click visual novel about getting what you always wanted.

A long time ago, during high school, our hero fell in love with a beautiful girl named Rose. Unfortunately, she was dating a guy named Dave, who was a total jerk and asshole.

Years later, our hero runs into Rose again, and it turns out that she's still with Dave. They are already engaged and need to organize the wedding, and our hero is just the man for the job! Now that our hero can spend time with Rose again, he can slowly change her and make her his. Luckily, their mutual friend Paris has agreed to help our hero in exchange for a small favor...

Corrupt the bride, have sex with other girls and make your dreams come true in Bride Corruption!
